website_summaries.verdict: A good budget option from Sony to replace your existing single din factory stereo.
pros: Provides better connectivity to smart devices in older cars
Comes with a dual Bluetooth system to connect multiple devices and phones at the same time
For example, dual phones can provide navigation, call, and play music at once
cons: Requires special adapter brackets for cars with double din bays

customer_reviews.title: The stereo works great when it works
customer_reviews.text: The stereo works great when it works. There are times where the stereo will not power up or it just resets itself out of the blue. When it doesn't power up, I have to take the stereo keys and slide the unit out and take the wire harness out until I hear it power up. This is really annoying when this happens because I have to redo all my settings. I can't recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: vapeNdragg

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Sony
customer_reviews.text: To fancy so many features can’t navigate have to get the book out
customer_reviews.author: jerry morris

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised in out Lance camper. Works great to stream music from iPod/iphone to stereo. Setup is pretty easy and it sounds amazingly good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Best bang 4 your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. Goes REAL LOUD. has an build in amp. Supposly if you don't have an amp for the highs you can use the desk for an amp. Idk how it works cuz I'm running 2 amps as we speak.
customer_reviews.author: Ant-B_28

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice stereo. Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: The app only works it the phone is plugged into it. Doesn't work over just Bluetooth. However, it is a nice stereo. Love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great radio, great price
customer_reviews.text: Old Sony CDX-GS500R... This is a Nice upgrade, Bluetooth sounds excellent
customer_reviews.author: elgin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome head unit, produce great quality sound with a lots of awesome feathers! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Victorson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stereo everything works great and the price was just ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stereo everything works great and the price was just right. I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT MY SYSTEM ROCKS THE HOUSE.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony marquez

customer_reviews.title: What up Sony?
customer_reviews.text: Button design is poor even with the remote available pressing the right buttons with out practice could cause a car wreck. The system itself is very quirky. It decides what will show in the information panel...and just to display the time takes 3 long steps of button holding every time you start the car. The app is very useless but is required to use connection between phone and stereo. Its a head scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brown

customer_reviews.title: SONY GS Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent car radio sound. You can feel free to drive without hands free.
customer_reviews.author: prosergi

customer_reviews.title: sony
customer_reviews.text: The app you download kinda sucks. Was shipped fast and received everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was looking for. I mounted in my faring on my Harley. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. Everything works how it should and it sounds awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher DeLisle

customer_reviews.title: looks good sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Tunability is pretty decent and the look is nice. Sounds seems pretty clean, its a good quality product
customer_reviews.author: niles

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few weeks. Sound horible in the high range. Sent it in for replacement over a week and a half ago. I am still waiting. I don't know how sony thinks it is ok to make a customer go this long without a stereo in your car. This will definitely be the last sony product I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Twigg

customer_reviews.title: and all connections are still good. I don’t know if it has a factory ...
customer_reviews.text: The Sony GS Series MEXGS610BT lasted for six months. It is in my daughters ford focus and no fuses are blown. It will not turn on, it beeps 5 times when the car is turned on or off, but will not power on. I removed the unit from the dash and all wires are okay, and the little fuse in the rear is not blown either. It was installed with a wire harness kit, and all connections are still good. I don’t know if it has a factory warranty or not, maybe someone knows?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I have to spend $130 for the wire harness (for the connection), but it WILL NOT sync up to my steering wheel controls.
customer_reviews.author: Charity W

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit, designed for Android but works great with my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Not available in Canada normally because it has support for Pandora radio which is not available here, but otherwise is a great deck. Despite being made for android, it works great with my iPhone, including the voice commands, Siri and Bluetooth audio. Love the colour options and relative simplicity of use. Pause and play controls could be bigger or differentiated (it uses the tiny memory selection buttons); I've coped by adding an obvious marking with white-out. Sounds good, great connections.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating POS
customer_reviews.text: Cant get the clock to display. Only way to tell what time it is to adjust the clock. Way too complicated for a car stereo to be. Replaced an older sony car stereo so i coukd get rid of the AUX cable. Wosrt decision ever. Hit the wrong button while trying to turn the radio? Forget it youre not turning it down now without figuring out how how to get out of that mode first. Frustrating Pos
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: App and controls
customer_reviews.text: I came from a Sony xplod radio but gave it away with my old car. I saw this one and was excited when it came with the remote control but was super excited for the Bluetooth. A few things I didn't care for: I don't like the app to control the radio, it seems like most of the controls are on the app only as opposed to my older radio. Another thing I wish it had is a multi disk tray but I can't find that in any of today's radios. Other than the app I like the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks great. Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Best receiver ive bought from sony, lots of power and sounds fantastic! Tons of options and settings. Looks great too. Definitely a huge step up from xplod series. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: bass-a-holic

customer_reviews.title: Much controls
customer_reviews.text: For myself, it was pretty complex to learn how tune this deck. This deck was for my son’s car and he had no problem. Guess I getting old.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Yamasaki

customer_reviews.title: Really great if you want to upgrade your system
customer_reviews.text: Really great if you want to upgrade your system. Installed it into my '04 Toyota 4Runner and works flawlessly, I couldn't ask for a better product for what you're paying. It's REALLY good. Very customizable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Nuke

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, and features for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, and features for the price. The provided mic for phone calls could be better designed to allow more flexible installation, but it works well. Current design limits the placement, and position.
customer_reviews.author: RickStock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its OK, but it locked up a few times when I plugged in USB drives
customer_reviews.author: J.W.W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good sound. love the changing colors. love the phone control app.
customer_reviews.author: Crystina L. Penn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. It does lock you out of keyboard use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. It does lock you out of keyboard use. A safety feature (shouldn't be typing and driving), but it is a little annoying. Other than that - awesome. It is the head of my JL Audio system (W7) and its a plus that this deck is a 5V. Very powerful. Most decks are 2V. Tune your amps accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This head unit is amazing. It does so much more than what I ...
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is amazing. It does so much more than what I use it for. I only use the pre outs for 2 amps. Also the bluetooth connectivity is great. Also a very good price
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price! 10 band eq allows you to fine tune your music, built in filters, too much to list! Put your music on a flash (thumb) drive, and listen via the front USB port. This a great feature if your in stalling this on a motorcycle!! (Motorcycle tip: You can NOT hear speakers mounted behind you, at highway speeds. Get yourself a set of lowers, and mount speakers in them. Instead of spending the $$ on bag lids, and speakers...
customer_reviews.author: Greg honrud

customer_reviews.title: Hands free microphone does not work
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this item 2 stars because it was installed just fine, but when I plug in the supplied microphone the whole thing freezes up and does not work. The moment you unplug the microphone it goes back to working. Can't get any help from Sony because you get someone in the Philippines who can't speak English very well. Waste of money paying for the extra with the mic plugin the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, very easy to use with my iPhone. Took 30 minutes to install and everything works great!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Relatively easy install. Menu is a little confusing.
customer_reviews.author: flyhter67

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Worst stereo I've purchased. All the options are very difficult to use, especially when driving. The screen is impossible to read with even the slightest glare. Recently downloaded the app that makes it slightly easier to find music but now I've gotta be looking at my phone when driving which is illegal. Pretty unhappy I let the return window pass on this stereo.
customer_reviews.author: blazer951200

product_meta.title: Sony MEX-N4300BT Built-in Dual Bluetooth Voice Command CD/MP3 AM/FM Radio Front USB AUX Pandora Spotify iHeartRadio iPod / iPhone Siri and Android Controls Car Stereo Receiver with ALPHASONIK EARBUDS
product_meta.description: Style:NewProduct highlights: CD receiver with AM/FM tuner plays CDs, CD-Rs, and CD-RWs, including discs loaded with MP3, WMA, and FLAC files Sound Synchronization pulses lighting in time to your music remote control Bluetooth Features: voice control with iOS and Android phones NFC offers instant Bluetooth pairing with compatible phones dual-phone Bluetooth hands-free calling and audio streaming Smartphone Features: (see Details for info on compatibility with specific smartphones and apps): built-in iPod, iPhone, and iPad control AOA 2.0 Android connection compatibility Siri Eyes Free with compatible iPhones, voice control with select Android models Quick-BrowZer and Jump Mode search features Audio Features: EQ10 10-band equalizer high- and low-pass filters Extra Bass boost Expandability: inputs: front panel auxiliary and USB inputs outputs: 4-channel preamp outputs (2-volt rear/subwoofer) Other info: built-in amplifier (17 watts RMS CTA-2006/55 peak x 4 channels) compatible with most factory steering wheel audio controls (adapter required) detachable face with blue key illumination
feature_bullets: Bluetooth audio streaming w/Simple Secure Pairing
Convenient One-Touch listening with NFC technology
App Remote with voice control for select smartphones

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
